title: Wealthy, isolated, and incredible beaches: Perth Crypto City Guide
description:
The world’s most isolated capital is wealthy, offers stunning beaches, and has embraced crypto. Here’s our Crypto City Guide to Perth.

This Crypto City guide looks at Perths crypto culture, the citys most notable projects and people, its financial infrastructure, what retailers accept crypto and where you can find blockchain education courses along with a history of its crypto controversies.

City: Perth
Country: Australia
Population: 2.14M
Established: 1829

Jump to: Crypto culture, Projects and companies, Financial infrastructure, Where can I spend crypto? Education, Controversies and collapses, Notable figures.

Read more

title: Stead’s Blockchain-Powered Floating Cities of the Future
description: Stead is an Arbitrum-based DeFi platform (Stead.Builders) that provides liquidity for small marine businesses, fishermen, and fish farmers, most of whom are unbanked or operating in developing countries.
